title: Northern Invasion: Empire Under Siege - Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Mod Gameplay
description:
A Scandinavian Alliance is on the march, Norway and Sweden send a massive army to Invade the Holy Roman Empire.  Since the Holy Roman Army  is on Holiday, it is up to their vassals to protect the fatherland.  Enjoy the Siege battle :D

Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD is a mod for Total War: Attila.

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
